title: ISO/AWI TR 23975
description: Traditional Chinese medicine — Priority list of single herbal medicines for developing standards
cleaned_text: Abstract This document provides a reference of single herbal medicines in order of their priority in the development of international standards. - Status: Under development - Edition: 2 - Technical Committee: [ISO/TC 249](/committee/598435.html)Traditional Chinese medicine - - ICS : Life cycle - PreviouslyPublished [ISO/TR 23975:2019](/standard/77493.html) - NowUnder development ISO/AWI TR standard contributes to the following [Sustainable Development Goal](/sdgs.html) Got a question?
